TopicTitle: KSP'ers new and old, come say hello :D

Articles.Content: Hey guys! I'm Select Few, and while I may be new to the forum, I'm not new to KSP. I've owned it for a few months and am comfortable with how everything in-game works (Though I'm still learning some things).
hi, ive been playing the game for a while and only just discovered this forum, its cool
Hi! Have been playing KSP demo since a while and got it as soon as it was available on Steam. Great game!
'Tis sad that I lost my account, didn't have a high post count but at least I'd become a bottle rocketeer!
Finally back. Got strange issue with recreating my account. As I used the old name, it considered me as spammer, lol. But happy to be back
same, but oh well we'll just have to build up again.

Hello, all. I'm new to the forums, and relatively new to KSP. I've never a more enraging, and simultaneously satisfying time in my long gaming history. I landed on the Mun, and am en route to Duna with a rover. I can't wait to see where this game goes!

It's good to be back. It's unfortunate about the lost data, but at least we have our home on the internets again.

Welcome back everyone!

Cheers

Do you mean the interblag?
hi, I had to recreate my forum account, please let me skip the 5 moderated posts and all that!

Oh no. A pop up... "Hello World"

I'm somewhat new to forums. Hope I can get the hang of this quick, I want to contribute to the community and plus I've got some neat pictures.
I just made an account, Nice to meet you all!
Greetings fellow Kerbonauts!

hey guys i have a question for you...

1. how do i upload a ship file to kerbal spaceport if i already have an account

2. does it matter what mods i have as long as the craft i am uploading is completely stock parts

3. anything i really should know about uploading ships to the spaceport.

Good day all! New here & just registrated. Did accidentally start two topics of me joining, before I read they had to be approved first, so hereby an apology to the moderators!

Edited May 1, 2013 by Starlight
I didnt survive the April Roll Back, but luckily my account was still fresh with only 1 post =D. Now to start anew!
Hi all! I'm new to Kerbal and and looking forward to the journey!
Hello fellow Kerbanauts! Just discovered this wonderful game on Steam this week, and it is taking over my life! Not since I discovered Minecraft has something so fascinated me.
Hi everyone. Account wasn't eaten but my posts were.

Hello fellow Kerbanauts! Just discovered this wonderful game on Steam this week, and it is taking over my life! Not since I discovered Minecraft has something so fascinated me.

Enjoy KSP!

My account got eaten, but I'm kinda happy about it because I can change my username

I was Malnu123 before
I've been here

kept my account, but a little sad about my threads that got eaten.

C'est la vie.

also, my signiture.

I'm still alive. o/

I'm just not very active. (I promise to pick-up the high-res mapping project sometime in beta perhaps; just when the planets aren't so damn malleable. )
Have owned this game for 10 days and have already clockedin at 94 hours. Can anyone say addict?
I was going to join up ages ago but after the April massacre I'm glad I didn't...
